text: Jwatam'bombele (jwine) duwa jambone (janti inkombolechele ichindu yambone), takole liunjili lya (yambone) yakuumila mu jalakwejo, nombe soni jwatam'bombele (jwine) duwa jakusakala, takole liunjili lya (yakusakala) yakuumila mu jalakwejo, sano Allah pa chindu chilichose awele Jwakombola (kuchitendela umboni ni kuchisunga)
